public abstract class AbstractAzureStorageClientBuilderFactory<T> extends AbstractAzureHttpClientBuilderFactory<T>
Abstract factory for Storage client builder.

    • consumeRetryPolicy

      protected BiConsumer<T,com.azure.core.http.policy.RetryPolicy> consumeRetryPolicy()
      The default implementation for setting retry policy in Storage clients. The storage clients are not using the retry policy as other HTTP-based clients.
      Specified by:
      consumeRetryPolicy in class AbstractAzureHttpClientBuilderFactory<T>
      Returns:
      the empty consumer for setting retry policy.
